howToUse.title: How to Use NexReason
howToUse.subtitle: Master the art of AI-powered decision making with our comprehensive guide

step1.title: Choose Your Mode
step1.description: Select analytical, emotional, or creative thinking approach

step2.title: Describe Your Decision
step2.description: Provide detailed context about your decision dilemma

analytical.title: Analytical Mode
analytical.description: Perfect for data-driven decisions requiring logical analysis, financial calculations, and risk assessment.
analytical.example: Should I invest in real estate or stocks given my current financial situation and 10-year goals?

emotional.title: Emotional Mode
emotional.description: Ideal for decisions involving relationships, personal values, and life changes that impact well-being.
emotional.example: Should I move to another city for a job opportunity, considering my family and social connections?

creative.title: Creative Mode
creative.description: Great for exploring innovative solutions, unconventional approaches, and breakthrough thinking.
creative.example: How can I transform my hobby into a profitable business while maintaining my passion for it?

good.title: Do This
good.specific: Be specific about your situation and constraints
good.constraints: Mention time, budget, or other limitations

avoid.title: Avoid This
avoid.multiple: Asking multiple unrelated questions at once

career.question: Should I accept a job offer that pays 30% more but requires relocating to a different country?

relationship.question: Is it the right time to propose to my partner, considering our financial situation and career goals?

financial.question: Should I use my savings to pay off student loans or invest in a retirement account?

lifestyle.question: Should I pursue a minimalist lifestyle by selling most of my possessions and traveling?

profile.title: Profile Settings & Personalization
profile.description: Enhance your decision analysis experience by setting up your personal profile. NexReason uses this information to provide more relevant and personalized insights.

benefits.title: Benefits of Profile Setup
benefits.personalized: Get personalized recommendations based on your preferences and goals
benefits.contextual: Receive analysis that considers your life stage and circumstances
benefits.relevant: More relevant examples and scenarios tailored to your situation
benefits.improved: Improved accuracy in risk assessment and decision guidance

setup.title: How to Set Up Your Profile
setup.step1Description: Look for the profile icon in the analyze page header and click it
setup.step2Description: Add details like age, profession, interests, goals, and decision-making style
setup.step3Description: Save your profile and start receiving personalized decision analysis

smartProfiling.title: Smart Profiling Feature
smartProfiling.description: NexReason can automatically detect patterns from your questions and suggest profile updates to improve your experience. You'll be notified when smart insights are available.

languages.title: Multi-Language Support
languages.description: NexReason provides equally detailed analysis in all supported languages. Ask your question in your preferred language for the best experience.
